title: UNP to support no-confidence motion against President
body_lines: The United National Party will support the No Confidence Motion against President Gotabaya Rajapaksa which is being prepared by TNA M.P. M. A. Sumanthiran, the Party said.
“It is important that the Parliament conveys the lack of confidence in the President that the public has demonstrated,” UNP Assistant Leader Akila Viraj Kariawasam said today .
